projects.title: DisaVu
projects.description: Solution that uses machine learning to improve disaster response after hurricanes/tornados
achievements: First place in the AWS Disaster Response Hackathon
Machine learning models to predict building footprints and to predict whether those footprints are damaged
Solution was presented in RE:MARS by AWS

projects.title: CORTX Spark Integration
projects.description: Hadoop and Spark integration using Seagates CORTX S3 compatible API
achievements: Second place in the Seagate CORTX Integration Challenge
Built an ansible script to deploy Hadoop and Spark using CORTX as object storage to an Ubuntu virtual machine

projects.title: Sensing the air quality in my room
projects.description: Wired up sensors to the Azure Sphere IOT device and used Azure IOT and Azure services to store and display data
achievements: Runner up in the Azure Sensing the World competition
Used Azure Direct methods to modify mutable state of the device from the cloud
Wrote my own libraries for the MHZ-19 and PMS-7003 devices

projects.title: Lock and Load
achievements: Tier 2 Award (multiple runners up) in the Secure Everything with Azure Sphere Challenge

projects.title: WACTF 2018 - Second Place
projects.description: WACTF is a weekend long challenge based cybersecurity competition (Capture the Flag) created and hosted by the Perth cybersecurity community. Our team solved a variety of challenges
achievements: Placed second amongst 60 teams competing that weekend

projects.title: Monte Rocks
projects.description: Created a physics based simulator to minimise rock bridges
